title: HPD: Baby wounded during attempted murder-suicide
content:
HOUSTON - Houston Police responded to reports of a young child shot at an apartment on the southwest side Wednesday morning.
The shooting was reported on Deering Drive near Country Creek Drive, not far from Beltway 8 and the Southwest Freeway before 8 a.m.
Police say a man shot his girlfriend before turning the shotgun on himself. Their 1- or 2 -year-old baby was wounded in the attempted murder-suicide.
The baby was taken to Texas Children's Hospital. The conditions of the victims and the suspect are not known.
Witnesses told police they heard arguing just before the shots rang out. Neighbors then called 911.
